mapper.sql: id, commodity, image_type, image_url, user_id, create_time
mapper.select:
SELECT ci.id AS id, ci.commodity AS commodity, c.commodity_name AS commodityName, ci.image_type AS imageType, ci.image_url AS imageUrl, ci.user_id AS userId, ci.create_time AS createTime FROM commodity_image ci LEFT JOIN commodity c ON ci.commodity = c.id
1=1
and c.commodity_name like concat(concat('%',#{commodityName}),'%')
GROUP BY ci.id
